name: Defy Ventures
description: The innovative programs and generous supporters help incarcerated individuals unlock their purpose, allowing them to get jobs, start businesses, feel good about themselves, and be better partners and parents. It’s only when people see the good in one another that you can break the cycle and improve the system. Defy NorCal serves two state prisons—Correctional Training Facility in Soledad and Pleasant Valley State Prison in Coalinga—and has a growing post-release program.
